title: [SOLVED]No green light on 820-00165
message: Hello, on this 820-00165 PP3V42 is 1,394V. Resistance to GND is 0,309V. SMC_BC_ACOK is 1,38V and resistance to GND is 0,465. I checked U7000 area, because the two signals show up there together. R7101 has 5V on both sides, CHGR_ACIN is 4,3V, CHGR_DCIN is 16,6V so everything looks fine here for me. Pins 2 (PP3V42) and 4 of J6100 look a little burned (just a little black touch, but visible). Also U6100 Pin 1-4 look a little bad. (as if there is nearly no solder on them compared to Pins 5-8) but maybe thats just my eyes tricking me. The machine was used in a "slightly wet" environment (tropic climate), but no evidence of water. his is one of the cleanest machines/ boards i´ve ever seen.

title: [SOLVED]No green light on 820-00165
message: Check R7096; it is corroded probably...

title: [SOLVED]No green light on 820-00165
message: No 3V42 so check voltage on pin 6 U7090. Check for corrosion around U7090 in general.

title: [SOLVED]No green light on 820-00165
message: I replaced D7005 wit another diode with equal size. Now SMC_BC_ACOK is there but jumping between 1,8V and 3,3V. Diode Mode reading is 1,115V. PP3V42 is ok. Is this indicating a problem with the SMC?

title: [SOLVED]No green light on 820-00165
message: sorry wrong post...Due to human verification i mixed the pages up...

title: [SOLVED]No green light on 820-00165
message: I have no idea what you are doing. First 3V42 is not there, now you are replacing D7005, why?

title: [SOLVED]No green light on 820-00165
message: I`m really sorry about that. I posted my answer in the wrong Tab. I must have mixed the tabs up as i logged off and back in for human verification and copied the message. It should be in my "820-2330 no green light" post i also have open right now. I posted it there now. Meanwhile i could fix this one. I don´t know how i could miss this the first time. It was a dead U7090. 16V at Pin 6 and 8 and no output. So sorry again for wasting your time and thank you very much for the help!

title: [SOLVED]No green light on 820-00165
message: Yes. everything seems to work fine now. Thank you!
